text: The 1984 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship was a series of motorcycle speedway races with all participants under the age of 21. The title was won by Marvyn Cox. ==European final== *July 28, 1984 * King's Lynn, Norfolk Arena ==See also== 1984 Individual U-21 Individual U-21 Category:Speedway competitions in the United Kingdom
title: 1984 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
